rows.label: tev091401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev091401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Bart about New LA's outer wall.

rows.label: tev091401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev091401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Bart about recent developments.

rows.label: tev091401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Bart about damage to New LA's outer wall.

rows.label: tev091401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Bart about New LA's outer wall.

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0001
rows.name:
The outer wall of New LA also served as the hull of the
White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Essential parts of the city's power and communications
grids are embedded inside it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0003
rows.name:
So if it were to be destroyed, of course we'd have to
worry all kinds of outside enemies infiltrating the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0004
rows.name:
But the bigger problem is that New LA's core
functionality as a city would be in danger of collapse![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm not going to let Lin beat me when it comes to
keeping the wall both inspected and maintained,
so I hope you'll do your part to keep it protected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0010
rows.name:
The other day, Lin and I had a great brainstorming
session about the way energy is supplied to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0011
rows.name:
One of the ideas that stuck out for me was using the
lava from Molten Hollow to the north as a source of
geothermal power.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0012
rows.name:
I've asked command to let me research the feasibility
of the idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0013
rows.name:
Now don't get me wrong—I'm sure Lin is a hell of a
BLADE when it comes to combat and the like...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0014
rows.name:
But she has such interesting ideas! I wish she could just
work as a mechanic here with me every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0019
rows.name:
We took a lot of hits from the Ganglion's artillery,
but the walls were barely damaged at all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Remember, that wall was the hull of the White Whale—
it was built to resist space debris even when traveling
at faster-than-light speeds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong—I was terrified to see our enemies
infiltrate as far as they did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0022
rows.name:
But I knew that between you BLADEs and this wall
that was left to us by the builders of the White Whale,
the battle was ours to lose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0027
rows.name:
I was researching who it was that designed the hull of
the White Whale so that it could shrug off even the
Ganglion's artillery...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0028
rows.name:
And guess what I found? The names of Lin's parents
were listed among its architects![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0029
rows.name:
I heard that they'd died in an accident during the
testing of the main engine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev091401_MSG0030
rows.name:
And yet, in a way, they're still protecting Lin and the
rest of us today.[ST:wait ]
